title:
Functional calculus of quantum channels for the holomorphic discrete
  series of $SU(1,1)$
abstract:
The tensor product of two holomorphic discrete series representations of
$SU(1,1)$ can be decomposed as a direct sum of infinitely many discrete series.
I shall introduce equivariant quantum channels for each component of the direct
sum, mapping bounded operators on one factor of the tensor product to operators
on the component. Next I prove a limit formula for the trace of the functional
calculus and I prove that the limit can be expressed using generalized Husimi
functions or using Berezin transforms.
